name: Terratoon
description:
* PLEASE NOTE THIS IS CONCEPTUAL! Play in fullscreen! The build is better to run :)

This is just a test with blender, animation rigging, post processing, shaders and a dream. Most assets aren't mine (credited below), but it's just a test! I've thought up a game to give the player freedom to explore planets of different qualities, to roam freely and to explore the depths of their power. 

If you wish to play this, I advise you download the build down below - WebGL is rather laggy! 

Of course as this is a concept, things sometimes feel clunky, but that's okay! :D

Controls

WASD - move

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Run

Move mouse - camera movement

Scroll wheel - camera zoom

Q/E - actions

Credits

Boy model by RinRainicorn

Town by Broken Vector

Music by Patrick De Arteaga
